usage_rules: Use Primary (Slate 900) for Sidebar, Headings, and Primary Buttons.
Use Secondary (Orange 500) sparingly for 'Create New', 'Submit', or critical alerts.
Background should be Slate 50 (#f8fafc) to reduce eye strain.
Cards and Tables must be White (#ffffff) with a subtle border (#e2e8f0).
NEVER use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid colors or subtle noise textures.

inputs.style: bg-white border-input focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20 focus:border-primary transition-all duration-200

visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle noise texture on the sidebar background if possible.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Install 'lucide-react' for icons, 'recharts' for charts, 'date-fns' for dates.
2. THEME: Configure tailwind.config.js to use the specific Slate and Orange palette defined above.
3. FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css immediately.
4. LAYOUT: Create a 'DashboardLayout' component that includes the Sidebar and Header. All protected pages must be wrapped in this.
5. LOGIN: Create a split-screen login page. Left side form, Right side image (login_hero) with a dark overlay and a quote.
6. TABLES: Use Shadcn Table component. Ensure headers are sticky. Add 'data-testid' to all rows.
7. PDF: Use 'react-to-print' or 'jspdf' for generating documents. Create a dedicated 'PrintLayout' component that is hidden from screen but used for printing.
8. CALCULATIONS: All financial calculations (profit, margin) must happen in real-time on the frontend for preview, but validated on backend.
9. RESPONSIVE: Ensure the Sidebar becomes a Sheet/Drawer on mobile.
10. TESTING: Add 'data-testid' to every interactive element (buttons, inputs, rows).
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) for sticky headers.
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable. Cramped designs look cheap.
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable.
